components.label: HTML
components.content:
Welcome!

Here you will find features to:

  • Add programs and study period offerings
  • Complete program info requests
  • Confirm enrolments and view upcoming enrolments
  • Report a change for scholastic standing
  • Manage your institution profile, locations, users, and designations (admins only)

attrs.value: An illustration of a group of people waving hello. Illustration by Storyset.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Get started here

For a step-by-step guide, use our training aid document.

components.label: HTML
components.content: For admin users Only admins have access to manage your institution account. Admins can navigate to "Manage Institution" in the top navigation to do so.

components.label: HTML
components.content: For admin users Only admins have access to manage your institution account. Admins can navigate to "Manage Institution" in the top navigation to do so.

components.label: HTML
components.content: For legal signing authority Only a legal authority can sign off on the designation agreement.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Add new user(s)

Begin by adding other users from your institution who will be account administrators.

After creating your locations (Step 2), you can continue to add the basic users who will have access to particular locations.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Add location(s)

Next, add your institution location(s).

Admin's can now assign people to specific or all locations.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Add programs

Add at least one program to start.

You can continuously add programs as you need.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Request designation

Request designation for your institution.

Request designation status even if you have already received designation from SABC in previous years.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Need help?

For further information, please refer to the StudentAid BC Help Centre.

Or refer to the StudentAid BC Policy Manual for help.

To find a list of contacts, please see the contact information in the StudentAid BC Admin Manual.

attrs.value: An illustration of a person with a headset providing support. Illustration by Storyset.
